basics.name: Mangayarkarasi Thirugnanaselvam
basics.label: IT Professional
basics.summary: I am from Bangalore, India. I am a passionate and self motivated engineer with 6 years of IT experience. My current employer is Cloudera where I am working as a Senior Customer Operations Engineer in the Big Data domain.

highlights: Rank: 25/19841 (Top 0.1%) in the Department of Computer Science from Anna University
Nominated for the best student of the year from the Department of Computer Science
Troubleshooting technical issues and provide solutions to the problems that our customers are facing.
Creating testing strategies to reproduce a wide variety of customer environments regarding issues and bugs found within Hortonworks and Cloudera Environment.
Apply advanced system/infrastructure concepts to determine. Design and implement highly complex Hadoop ecosystem solutions.

Independently designed, implemented and handled 15+ Hadoop clusters for various projects using Hortonworks and Cloudera Hadoop distribution on cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure and private cloud and in-house data center.
Evaluate, select and integrate big data/Hadoop tools and frameworks required to provide the intended design, satisfying all essential compliance with regulatory policies and architecture standards.
Spawn, manage and troubleshoot - EC2 instances, security groups, VPCs, internet gateways, elastic load balancers and configure Cloud watch monitoring.
Handled Oracle Siebel Sales Opportunities, forecasting, activity management, service request, timesheet, and sales-service CRM desktop components.
Created workflows and scripts to generate and load millions of Opportunity records in Siebel production environment at the real-time.
Worked on Big data POCs for the devops research team where I was responsible to design, implement and manage Hadoop ecosystem using Cloudera distribution.
